title: Improved Kernel Alignment Regret Bound for Online Kernel Learning. (arXiv:2212.12989v2 [cs.LG] UPDATED)
abstract: In this paper, we improve the kernel alignment regret bound for online kernel learning in the regime of the Hinge loss function. Previous algorithm achieves a regret of $O((\mathcal{A}_TT\ln{T})^{\frac{1}{4}})$ at a computational complexity (space and per-round time) of $O(\sqrt{\mathcal{A}_TT\ln{T}})$, where $\mathcal{A}_T$ is called \textit{kernel alignment}. We propose an algorithm whose regret bound and computational complexity are better than previous results. Our results depend on the decay rate of eigenvalues of the kernel matrix. If the eigenvalues of the kernel matrix decay exponentially, then our algorithm enjoys a regret of $O(\sqrt{\mathcal{A}_T})$ at a computational complexity of $O(\ln^2{T})$. Otherwise, our algorithm enjoys a regret of $O((\mathcal{A}_TT)^{\frac{1}{4}})$ at a computational complexity of $O(\sqrt{\mathcal{A}_TT})$. translated_title: 在线核学习中的改进核对齐遗憾界
translated_abstract: 本文针对Hinge损失函数下的在线核学习，改进了核对齐遗憾界。我们提出了一种算法，其遗憾界和计算复杂度优于以前的结果。如果核矩阵的特征值呈指数衰减，则我们的算法在计算复杂度为$O(\ln^2{T})$，遗憾界为$O(\sqrt{\mathcal{A}_T})$。否则，我们的算法在计算复杂度为$O(\sqrt{\mathcal{A}_TT})$，遗憾界为$O((\mathcal{A}_TT)^{\frac{1}{4}})$。我们将算法扩展到批量学习，并获得了$O(\frac{1}{T}\sqrt{\mathbb{E}[\mathcal{A}_T]})$的余量风险界，取得了改进。
tldr: 本文提出了一种新的算法，在线核学习中的新算法遗憾界和计算复杂度优于以前的结果。该算法的遗憾界和计算复杂度取决于核矩阵特征值的衰减率。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a new algorithm with improved regret bound and computational complexity for online kernel learning in the regime of Hinge loss function. The algorithm's regret bound and computational complexity depend on the decay rate of eigenvalues of the kernel matrix. If the eigenvalues of the kernel matrix decay exponentially, the algorithm achieves a regret of $O(\sqrt{\mathcal{A}_T})$ at a computational complexity of $O(\ln^2{T})$. Otherwise, it achieves a regret of $O((\mathcal{A}_TT)^{\frac{1}{4}})$ at a computational complexity of $O(\sqrt{\mathcal{A}_TT})$. This algorithm has been extended to batch learning and obtains an excess risk bound of $O(\frac{1}{T}\sqrt{\mathbb{E}[\mathcal{A}_T]})$.
